CustomField.description: Item-00080 - Remap the field to Total_Cost_Cyber__c, so Proofing email template can display the GST Incl value, without waiting for ESB to update Salesforce through BookingLineItem.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is only used by CyberAd booking. This field will be displayed on Proofing email template.
CustomField.label: Total Booking Cost GST Incl
